participant_1.background:
I need to feel like I can be myself around my partner.
i am going to school for writing.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
i want to be a journalist but instead i sell washers at sears.
I want to quit skiing, but I'm afraid of disappointing my parents.

participant_2.background:
Being a mechanic was a tough job, but it made me tough enough to endure the tough love of my family.
i like going to the moves.
i still live at home.
My children are my only living family members.
i don t fully understand my own feelings.

content.text: Good! I just got back from the movies.
Really? What movie did you see?
It was called "The Notebook." Have you seen it?
No, but I have heard good things about it.
It's a really sad movie, but it's also really good.
I'm not really into sad movies, but I'll check it out sometime.
I'm a sucker for a good love story.
Me too! I'm currently in school for writing, and I want to be a journalist.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a writer, but I'm not sure if I have what it takes.
You definitely have what it takes! You just have to practice and be persistent.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, go out to eat, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
Great! We should hang out sometime.
